actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Referred to Subcommittee on Rules of the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rules of the House

official_title: A resolution authorizing the House Administration Committee to investigate, recount, and report on contested elections for the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Requires the Committee on House Administration to investigate contested election results if a candidate deposits $5,000, with the Clerk of the House of Representatives, for expenses incurred in conducting a recount. Provides for a full refund of such amount if the committee determines that such recount alters the result of the election. Refunds any remaining amounts, after expenses, if a recount does not alter election results.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the House Administration Committee to investigate, recount, and report on contested elections for the House of Representatives.
